headlines.headline: Fantasy basketball: What to do with Paul George, Lauri Markkanen and six other trending players
headlines.description: Helping you decide whether to give up on a few struggling players or believe in those who are ascending.

headlines.headline: Will LeBron take a pay cut to stay with the Lakers?
headlines.description: Brian Windhorst looks at the possible permutations for LeBron James' next career move.

headlines.headline: NBA buzz: Latest updates, trades, intel ahead of Feb. 5 deadline
headlines.description: Catch up on the latest buzz, trade alerts and league intel from our ESPN NBA insiders.

headlines.headline: How the Rockets bullied their way to one of the NBA's best offenses
headlines.description: Kevin Durant and the Houston Rockets have bullied their way into one of the NBA's best offenses this season.

headlines.headline: NBA midseason lessons: What we're hearing on all 30 teams
headlines.description: What have we learned about every team throughout the first half of 2025-26? Tim Bontemps canvasses the league.

headlines.headline: LeBron on Buss report: 'Don't care how somebody feels about me'
headlines.description: LeBron James said he wasn't bothered by an ESPN story this week that detailed his allegedly strained relationship with Lakers team governor Jeanie Buss, saying, "I don't care about how somebody feels about me."

headlines.headline: Can new coach Jesse Minter provide impact for Jackson, Ravens?
headlines.description: The Ravens can only hope that Minter continues to follow Macdonald's path.

headlines.headline: NFL coaching turnover since 2002: Highest to lowest teams
headlines.description: Since 2002, the Raiders have had 12 head coaches. Conversely, the Ravens and Steelers have only had two a piece. Check out the breakdown by team now.

headlines.headline: Ex-lineman Kevin Johnson killed at L.A. encampment, examiner says
headlines.description: Former Eagles defensive lineman Kevin Johnson died from "blunt head trauma and stab wounds" at a homeless encampment, according to the Los Angeles medical examiner.

headlines.headline: Why Jesse Minter is the right guy to fix Ravens' defense
headlines.description: Harry Douglas and Peter Schrager discuss the Ravens hiring Jesse Minter and how he can help fix the Ravens' defense.

headlines.headline: Schrager: There's no tougher person in the NFL than Matthew Stafford
headlines.description: The "Get Up" crew describes Matthew Stafford's outstanding season and what the Seahawks need to be mindful of to pull out a win vs. the Rams.

headlines.headline: Why Louis Riddick hasn't lost faith in the Broncos
headlines.description: Louis Riddick says if the Broncos lose the AFC Championship Game, it won't be because of Jarrett Stidham.

headlines.headline: NHL Power Rankings: 1-32 poll, each team's top celebrity fan
headlines.description: The Canes move into the top 3, while the Penguins and Mammoth rise too. Which team was the biggest faller?
